title: Current Bug?
body:
After I finished a normal queue, my friends and i apparently needed to reconnect to the game that we finished? 

Anyone else?

replies.body: This was likely related to[ an issue that we're currently working on resolving](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-server-issues-28th-jan-2015). This should clear up over time, and the reconnect option should go away.
